---
title: Sciatica Bothersome Index (SBI)
---


This is the sister test that pairs with the [*sciatic frequency index (SFI)*]({{< var ref-sciatic-frequency-index.path >}})

Items are scored on a 7pt scale from 0-6

- 0 Not bothersome
- 3 "Somewhat bothersome"
- 6 "Extremely bothersome"

- Leg Pain
- Numbness or tingling in the foot or groin
- Weakness in the leg or foot
- Back or leg pain while sitting
